vsParam:
Guys.
Do you have a minute now?

The assignment from relicology requires
us to gather a very rare plant...

A rare plant? What is it? I'm curious!
We all want to go!

Ah, actually... I don't know where to find this plant.
Here's its info...

Uh!? Wh-what's... this? I've never seen such a plant!
Can we really find it!?

I think Ru Sensei must know where to find it,
otherwise he wouldn't give us such an assignment...

Anyway, I've done lots of research,
and I found out birds love this plant's fruit.

Even Anise couldn't find any more clues?
This assignment seems pretty tough... Uh?

Is it... The breeze lately should be cozy, huh?
This weather is very good for you to walk in the air.

Hmm, found a foraging site, huh?
Congratulations.
S-Sterk is talking with... a pigeon!?

N-no way! But Sterk and the pigeon,
the combination really makes me surprised.
Speaking of pigeon, it's a bird...

Ah! Perhaps the pigeon knows
something about the plant!

It's possible,
but how to ask... a pigeon? Ah, hey, [px]!?
Sterk, I have a question to ask you...
Sterk, I have a question to ask this pigeon!
What is it? I'd answer you anything as long as I could.
Ask the pigeon? What do you want to ask?
Ah, start chatting so directly, huh...

Hmm... What's wrong?
Don't you have something to ask me? Go ahead.

Uh... We want to ask if the... pigeon knows where
to find this plant... Ha, ha-ha!

... Uh. So?
Do you know where to find this plant?
Coo coo... Coo coo coo coo, coo coo!

Um, h-he's really... talking with a pigeon?
And taking notes!

You are sure about it huh?
I see, thank you.

That pigeon said
it saw that plant in this area.

S-Sterk... really got the information from... a pigeon!?
Anyway... Let's go check it out...

I'm going with you.
Maybe you'll run into a monster.
According to that pigeon, we should find the plant near here...

Ah! I see it!
It must be the plant mentioned in the assignment!

U-unbelievable...
But it seems to be the plant we are looking for...

Hmm... But there's a monster pecking at its fruit.
We can't gather it with the monster around.

Yeah, it's true.
Let's chase away the monster first!

Phew... We got it.
Thank you so much, Sterk!

Hmm... You shouldn't thank me.
You should thank that pigeon instead.

To be honest, compared with the rare plant, I'm more
shocked with the fact that Sterk could talk with pigeons...

Hmm! Do all knights in Arland possess the ability
to talk with pigeons!?

No, it's not like that... I wasn't talking with pigeons.
I just take guesses at what they try to tell us.

Yes. If you must find a reason, perhaps that's because
I kept pigeons before, so I can largely understand them.

No no, you were definitely talking with it!? You got information
as specific as the plant's location from it, didn't you!?

Yes, I believe that both of you can understand each other!
Maybe that's Sterk's special power!?
No, I wouldn't call it special...

Hmm, why isn't it special!?
Even a fairy couldn't talk with pigeons!
I... I think I just found a new goal!

To be a great sage,
I must learn the pigeons' language!

First, I must... learn from Sterk
how to keep pigeons!

I-is this... even relevant?
Ha ha ha ha... Good luck, Anise.
